Package org.apache.solr.uima.processor

UIMAUpdateRequestProcessorFactory and related code.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SolrUIMAConfiguration Configuration holding all the configurable parameters for calling UIMA inside Solr
SolrUIMAConfigurationReader Read configuration for Solr-UIMA integration
UIMAToSolrMapper Map UIMA types and features over fields of a Solr document
UIMAUpdateRequestProcessor Update document(s) to be indexed with UIMA extracted information
UIMAUpdateRequestProcessorFactory Factory for UIMAUpdateRequestProcessor
 

Exception Summary
FieldMappingException Exception thrown when an error happening while mapping UIMA CAS model to Solt fields
 

Package org.apache.solr.uima.processor Description

UIMAUpdateRequestProcessorFactory and related code.
